mapper.insert: insert into snippets (source_url, type, color_id, memo, user_id) values (#{sourceUrl}, #{type}, #{colorId}, #{memo}, #{userId})
insert into snippet_codes (snippet_id, content, language) values (#{snippetId}, #{content}, #{language})
insert into snippet_images (snippet_id, image_url, alt_text) values (#{snippetId}, #{imageUrl}, #{altText})
mapper.select: select color_id, hex_code, name from snippet_colors where user_id = #{userId} or user_id = 0 order by color_id desc
